channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My daughter has $500K in med-school expenses. Can my wife and I afford to pay it off?
item.description: “Our annual income is $140,000. We are both on Medicare.”

item.title: Trump blasts trade deficits in goods as a big threat to the U.S. Why economists are dismayed.
item.description: With his two dozen letters to U.S. trading partners last week, President Donald Trump promised elevated tariffs on Aug. 1 largely to tackle an issue h...

item.title: United Airlines just tweaked its profit outlook for the year. It’s still not enough for the stock.
item.description: The revision comes amid ‘less geopolitical and macroeconomic uncertainty,’ United says.

item.title: I’m 70, a widow and struggled financially. How do I let go of the resentment I feel towards my wealthy, unhelpful brother?
item.description: “I’m now doing better financially than I ever thought I would. My house in Tucson is valued at $416,000.”

item.title: My grandmother disinherited my father, yet made him executor of her will. Now he refuses to file for probate.
item.description: “When my grandfather died, my father went into their home and took financial information and jewelry.”

item.title: Ether is starting to outperform bitcoin – and further gains could be ahead for the crypto, charts show
item.description: Ether is on an upswing as of late, and charts are showing that further gains could be around the corner.

item.title: Peter Thiel just bought a big stake in Tom Lee's ether company and the shares are surging
item.description: Bitmine Immersion Technologies recently launched an ether buying strategy and named Fundstrat's Tom Lee chairman.

item.description: Shares are up 54% in the past three months.

item.title: Netflix earnings are coming Thursday. Here's what top analysts expect
item.description: Netflix is slated to release its second-quarter results Thursday after market close, and analysts are expecting another blockbuster.

item.title: Despite Trump's tariffs, U.S. stocks with high international sales are beating domestic-focused names
item.description: A recent Goldman Sachs analysis found that the S&P 500 stocks with the greatest overseas sales exposure outperformed those with the least.
